full_summary:
**Truck, Tractor, Heavy Group 1 – Solicitation Notice**
==============================================

**Reference:** W8476-246763/A
**Publication Date:** May 13, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** July 3, 2024, 14:00:00 (Local Time)

The Department of National Defence, on behalf of the Government of Canada, invites interested suppliers to submit bid proposals under Solicitation Notice W8476-246763/A for the procurement of (14) truck, tractor, heavy Group 1, training and ancillary items.

The procurement falls under the Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HP-16TRUK Group 1 for Truck, Tractor, Heavy, Group 1, Configuration B, and specifies a 120-day delivery period from the receipt of order.

Eligibility to bid is restricted to suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the referenced RFSA. Suppliers interested in becoming pre-qualified under this RFSA can visit the Buy and Sell Government of Canada Platform at [https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HP-539-73419](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HP-539-73419).

**Trade Agreements:**
This Solicitation Notice is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

**Contact Information:**
Dong Le, Contracting Officer at dong.le@forces.gc.ca

\*\*Legal Disclaimers:*

* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
